fr.epita.iam.services

Class JDBCIdentityDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.epita.iam.services.JDBCIdentityDAO
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IdentityDAO

    public class JDBCIdentityDAO
extends java.lang.Object
implements IdentityDAO
    This is a class that contains all the database operations for the class Identity 
      JDBCIdentityDAO dao = new JDBCIdentityDAO();
  // save an identity
  dao.save(new Identity(...));
  
  //search with an example criteria (qbe)  
  dao.search(new Identity(...);
    warning this class is dealing with database connections, so beware to release it through the releaseResources()
    Author:
    tbrou
